user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and I need to validate the CPF numbers of the participants. Can you validate the CPF numbers of the following participants: 123.456.789-09, 987.654.321-00, 456.789.123-45? Additionally, please generate a random valid CPF number for a new participant.

TaskList.description: Validate the CPF number of the first participant (123.456.789-09).
Validate the CPF number of the second participant (987.654.321-00).
Validate the CPF number of the third participant (456.789.123-45).
Generate a random valid CPF number for a new participant.
